official_title: To provide that receipts and disbursements of the Highway Trust Fund shall not be included in the totals of the budget of the United States Government or the congressional budget.

summary.text: Highway Infrastructure Protection Act of 1991 - Prohibits the receipts and disbursements of the Highway Trust Fund (for both the Federal aid highway program and the Mass Transit Account) which are allocable to the transportation-related operations of such Fund from being included in either the Federal budget as submitted by the President or in the congressional budget. Exempts such Trust Fund from any general statutory budget limitation.

titles.title: To provide that receipts and disbursements of the Highway Trust Fund shall not be included in the totals of the budget of the United States Government or the congressional budget.
